message: Starting cognitive therapy question generation - analyzing REBT, Beck's Cognitive Therapy, and CBT distinctions

Crafting 5 questions: (1) ABCD therapy target - tricky conceptual, (2) negative triad application to depression case, (3) REBT disputing vs CBT approach distinction, (4) automatic thought identification, (5) why thoughts not situations cause distress

Successfully generated 5 high-quality cognitive therapy questions (2 tricky, 3 application) distinguishing REBT (Ellis ABCD model), Beck's Cognitive Therapy (automatic thoughts, negative triad), and CBT (integrated approach). All questions include comprehensive explanations for correct answers and detailed rationales for why each incorrect option is wrong. Questions cover: therapy target identification, negative triad application, REBT vs CBT distinction, automatic thought recognition, and core cognitive principle.
